sentences.sentence: The inner part of box body is installed with nylon gauze which has an inclosure structure.
sentences.translation: 盒体的内部设置有尼龙纱网，尼龙纱 网呈围笼结构；

sentences.sentence: The garden was a wide inclosure, surrounded with walls so high as to exclude every glimpse of prospect;
sentences.translation: 这花园是一大片圈起来的场地，四周围墙高耸，看不到外面的景色。
